availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Alexandria, Kentucky, farm laborer. Native of Germany. Son of Mary Sandfoss Jung. Resident of Kenton County in 1862. Farm laborer in Alexandria in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Campbell County, Alexandria, p. 4.
KYR-0001-004-1394.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton, District 1, p. 324.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Campbell County Will Books, Vol D-E, 1878-1926; (Accessed through ancestry.com on January 22, 2020), p.370-371.
